entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
